page.title: 20CORFFE. Ref: 02540129
page.content:
{CORFFE MANSION HOUSE DEVELOPMENT.
Corffe was until a few years ago the latest home of Sir Bouchier Wrey - the local gentry of this area. After sale, when the Bouchier Wreys emigrated to Africa, the house was converted into flats. The surrounding grounds are now in the hands of property developers and cottages are being built in very tasteful style in keeping with original country cottages of the area. It is developing into a small holiday village, the cottages being built for holiday home purchase and hire. {N.B.} Mansion type houses, barns and older type cottages are being converted to executive type dwellings by developers at the present time. It is becoming big industry.
